java-refactoring-mcp-stdio.comment: STDIO transport - Server started automatically by MCP client

java-refactoring-mcp-sse.comment: SSE transport - Server must be started manually with --project.path parameter

instructions.stdio: Use java-refactoring-mcp-stdio for production. Server starts automatically.
instructions.sse: For SSE mode: 1) Start server manually with --project.path, 2) Enable sse config, 3) Disable stdio config. See SSE_SETUP.md for details.
